Implement a bubble sort:

subroutine bubble_sort(arr, n)

  integer, intent(inout) :: arr(1:n)

  integer, intent(in) :: n

  integer :: i, j, temp

  do i =1, n-1

    do j=1, n-i

       if (arr(j) > arr(j+1)) then

           temp = arr(j)

           arr(j) = arr(j+1)

           arr(j+1) = temp

       end if

    end do

  end do

end subroutine bubble_sort

Then in the program:

 implicit none

 integer :: n, c, i

 integer, allocatable :: list(:)

 external :: bubble_sort! declare sub

    if (list(i) >=c) then

        c = c+1

    end if

 end do

 write(*,*) c

 deallocate(list)

 end program

 subroutine bubble_sort(arr, m)

   integer, intent (in out) :: arr(1: m)

   integer, intent(in) :: m

   integer :: i, j, temp

      do j =1, m - i

         if (arr(j) > arr(j+1)) then

             temp = arr(j)

             arr(j) = arr(j+1)

 end subroutine bubble_sort

subroutine bubble_sort(arr, n)

  integer, intent(inout) :: arr(1:n)

  integer, intent(in) :: n

  integer :: i, j, temp

  do i =1, n-1

    do j=1, n-i

       if (arr(j) > arr(j+1)) then

           temp = arr(j)

           arr(j) = arr(j+1)

           arr(j+1) = temp

       end if

    end do

  end do

 program codeforces_682_B

 implicit none

 integer :: n, c, i

 integer, allocatable :: list(:)

! read n

 read *, n

! allocate array

 allocate(list(n))

! read elements

 read *, (list(i), i =1, n)

! sort

 call bubble_sort(list, n)

! compute c

 c =1 

 do i =1, n

   if (list(i) >= c) then

      c = c+1

   end if

 end do

! write result

 write(*,*)c 

 deallocate(list)

 end program 

 subroutine bubble_sort(arr, n)

 integer, intent(inout) :: arr(1:n)

 integer, intent(in) :: n

 integer :: i, j, temp

 do i =1, n-1

   do j=1, n - i

     if (arr(j) > arr(j+1)) then

        temp = arr(j)

        arr(j) = arr(j+1)

        arr(j+1) = temp

     end if

   end do

 end do 

 end subroutine bubble_sort
